jmud
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  jmud.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Person
public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an entity. Entities can be objects, monsters, NPCs, and even characters. Entities represent anything that is not static in the game world.

Author:
Will Pall

Constructor Summary
Entity(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, Room currentRoom)
          Constructs an entity with the given name and description, and places it in the given room.
